mapper.select:
SELECT /*[DcDao.xml][selectDcList] 물류센터 데이터들을 조회 */ BIZ_CD , DC_CD , DC_NM , BIZ_NO , BIZ_NM , CEO_NM , POST_NO , BASIC_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , BIZ_TP , BIZ_KND , TEL_NO , FAX_NO , CONTACT_NM , CONTACT_TEL_NO , CONTACT_EMAIL , COUNTRY_CD , CITY_CD , USER_COL1 , USER_COL2 , USER_COL3 , USER_COL4 , USER_COL5 , REMARK , IN_DT , IN_USER_ID , UP_DT , UP_USER_ID FROM tb_ms_dc WHERE 1=1
AND ( DC_CD LIKE '%'#{dcNm}'%' OR DC_NM LIKE '%'#{dcNm}'%' )
